By working together, we’ll restore our reputation for environmental stewardship, and generate positive change for all Canadians. #FMM2016
I look forward to our #FMM in the fall, where we’ll finalize the pan-Canadian framework on clean growth and climate change. #FMM2016
We're confident that we're setting the country on a path towards long-term clean growth, and a more prosperous future for Canadians #FMM2016
We are committed to doubling investments in clean energy, research and development over five years. #FMM2016
We are committed to advancing efforts to eliminate the dependence on diesel in Indigenous, remote, and Northern communities. #FMM2016
We're committed to fostering dialogue and the development of regional plans for clean electricity transmission to reduce emissions. #FMM2016
We are committed to working with other governments and the private sector to advance the electrification of vehicle transportation. #FMM2016
We are committed to working together on how best to lever federal investments in the Low Carbon Economy Fund #FMM2016
We are committed to supporting climate change mitigation and adaptation through investments in infrastructure. #FMM2016
We will identify additional measures that all governments can take to achieve economic growth & emission reduction objectives. #FMM2016
We intend to present to the @UN a plan that is firmly rooted in collaboration and consultation, and represents all of Canada. #FMM2016
This year, we will work to sign and ratify the Paris Agreement. #COP21 #FMM2016
We will ensure robust & coordinated engagement with Indigenous Peoples, governments, businesses, stakeholders, & Canadians #FMM2016
Together, we will identify options for additional action on adaptation and climate resilience. #FMM2016
Together, we will identify options for additional action on specific mitigation opportunities. #FMM2016
Together, we will identify options for additional action on carbon pricing mechanisms. #FMM2016
Together, we will identify options for additional action on clean technology, innovation and jobs. #FMM2016
We will invest in green infrastructure, public transit, and energy efficient social infrastructure. #FMM2016
As for climate, the risks of inaction have major economic and social repercussions for us all. #FMM2016
This framework, which came out of #COP21, recognizes that growing our economy and protecting our environment go hand in hand. #FMM2016
We mapped out a common trajectory aimed at stimulating clean growth and adapting to climate change. #FMM2016
We are opening the door to a low-emission economy that will become a world leader in clean growth. #FMM2016
We have a shared vision of a country that will make maximum use of technology and innovation. #FMM2016
We agreed to undertake the domestic market reforms needed to enhance Canada’s competitiveness. #FMM2016
We discussed the importance of fostering innovation, encouraging trade and investing in skills development. #FMM2016
We will invest in green infrastructure to create good jobs and grow our economy sustainably. #FMM2016
To spur economic growth, we've committed to fast-tracking existing infrastructure allocations in all of the provinces & territories #FMM2016
We agreed that both immediate and long-term action is needed to support economic growth, job creation, and economic prosperity. #FMM2016

5/5 We will conduct a full review of the legislation unilaterally imposed on #Indigenous peoples by earlier governments.
4/5 We will fully implement the calls to action of the Truth and Reconciliation Commission.
3/5 It is time for a new fiscal relationship with First Nations that gives these communities sufficient, predictable, and sustained funding.
2/5 We will deliver increased funding for #FirstNations education and we will work on education reforms for First Nations children.
1/5 We have begun the process to create a national public inquiry into missing and murdered #Indigenous women and girls in #Canada.

For more information on today’s #ThroneSpeech, visit http://speech.gc.ca/en pic.twitter.com/8ffhfN1T88

Statement by the Prime Minister of Canada on the #ThroneSpeech:http://ow.ly/Vvmr3
By focusing on these priorities, we will make real change happen #ThroneSpeech
Our success is about doing well for ourselves and leaving an even better, more peaceful and prosperous world for our children #ThroneSpeech
This ambitious plan is the result of conversations with Canadians. You told us what you need to be successful, and we listened #ThroneSpeech
We will introduce legislation to legalize, regulate and restrict access to marijuana #ThroneSpeech
We will introduce legislation to get handguns and assault weapons off our streets #ThroneSpeech
We will introduce legislation to provide greater support for survivors of domestic violence and sexual assault #ThroneSpeech
Keeping Canadians safe is paramount. So is protecting our cherished rights and freedoms #ThroneSpeech
We will negotiate beneficial trade agreements, and pursue opportunities in emerging markets #ThroneSpeech
We will review existing defence capabilities, and invest in a leaner, more agile, better-equipped military #ThroneSpeech
We will renew our commitment to UN peacekeeping operations, and continue to work with allies in the fight against terrorism #ThroneSpeech
International development assistance will focus on the world’s poorest and most vulnerable #ThroneSpeech
We will strengthen relationships with allies, especially with our closest friend and partner, the United States #ThroneSpeech
pic.twitter.com/7zjq2aaReT
We will support CBC/Radio-Canada, promote our official languages, and invest in cultural and creative industries #ThroneSpeech
We will do more to support veterans and their families, to thank them for their service #ThroneSpeech
Canadians want to help and there is a need. We will welcome 25,000 new Canadians from Syria by the end of February, 2016 #ThroneSpeech
Immigrants will have tools to build successful lives here, reunite their families, and contribute to our economic prosperity #ThroneSpeech
We will work with First Nations so that every First Nations child receives a quality education #ThroneSpeech
We will launch an inquiry into missing and murdered Indigenous women and girls #ThroneSpeech
We will work cooperatively to implement recommendations of the Truth and Reconciliation Commission of Canada #ThroneSpeech
We will undertake to renew, nation-to-nation, the relationship between Canada and Indigenous peoples #ThroneSpeech
Canada is strong because of our differences, not in spite of them #ThroneSpeech
pic.twitter.com/dO67WpDuWz
Indigenous peoples will be more fully engaged in the process of reviewing and monitoring major resource development projects #ThroneSpeech
Public input will be sought. Environmental impacts minimized, and decisions informed by science #ThroneSpeech
Part of our efforts to restore public trust will include introducing new environmental assessment processes #ThroneSpeech
Making strategic investments in clean technology will encourage economic growth #ThroneSpeech
We will provide leadership on fighting climate change, as Canada works to put a price on carbon and reduce carbon pollution #ThroneSpeech
A clean environment and a strong economy go hand in hand. We cannot have one without the other #ThroneSpeech
pic.twitter.com/MRJwjrrvIj
What we won’t do speaks volumes. No partisan ads. No interfering with parliamentary officers. No prorogation. No omnibus bills #ThroneSpeech
We will promote more open debate and free votes to give Canadians a stronger voice in the #HoC #ThroneSpeech
We will create a new, non-partisan, merit-based process to advise on Senate appointments #ThroneSpeech
We will make sure every vote counts by consulting on electoral reform, and moving beyond the first-past-the-post voting system #ThroneSpeech
We are committed to an open and transparent government that restores the trust Canadians have in our public institutions #ThroneSpeech
pic.twitter.com/jCfq44LbUO
We will undertake these & other initiatives while pursuing a responsible & transparent fiscal plan #ThroneSpeech
We will begin work with the provinces and territories to develop a new Health Accord to support the well-being of Canadians #ThroneSpeech
We’ll create opportunities for youth by working with provinces & territories on more affordable post-secondary education #ThroneSpeech
The #EI system will be strengthened to best serve both the economy, and those who need it #ThroneSpeech
To give Canadians a more secure retirement we will work with provinces and territories to enhance the #CPP #ThroneSpeech
New investments in public transit, green infrastructure, and social infrastructure will create and support jobs and growth #ThroneSpeech
New Canada Child Care Benefit will give more direct help to those who need it by giving less to those who don’t #ThroneSpeech
As an immediate priority, we will deliver a tax cut for the #middleclass #ThroneSpeech
Canadians should have a real and fair chance to succeed. Central to that is a strong and growing #middleclass. #ThroneSpeech
pic.twitter.com/C9rKoYQxXB
Together we can make real change happen #ThroneSpeech
Canadians want leadership that is focused on the things that matter the most to them #ThroneSpeech
In this Parliament, all members will be honoured, respected and heard, wherever they sit #ThroneSpeech
Canada succeeds because diverse perspectives & different opinions are celebrated, not silenced #ThroneSpeech
